EmailTemplate.description: Sent when CPS BGA Process Cases are closed
EmailTemplate.name: BGA Process Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject} has been completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We are pleased to inform you that your request described below has been completed.
{!Case.Description}
Thank you.
The Honeywell Aerospace C&PS BGA Business Process Team
